---
id: _third_party_oauth2_gettoken
title: Apply Token
sidebar_label: Apply Token
description: /public/uaa/oauth2/token?client_id={client_id}&client_secret=${client_secret}&grant_type={grant_type}&code={code}
---

## 接口

**GET** `/public/uaa/oauth2/token?client_id={client_id}&client_secret=${client_secret}&grant_type={grant_type}&code={code}`

## 请求参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `client_id` | string | 是 |  | Institutional identity | Please apply to XT.COM |
| `client_secret` | string | 是 |  | Institutional Secret Key | Please apply to XT.COM |
| `grant_type` | string | 是 |  | authorization type, fixed value | authorization_code |
| `code` | string | 是 |  | The user is redirected to the institution page after authorization, and the code field will be carried in the url |  |

## 示例请求
